titleStmt.title: A publick plea, opposed to a private proposal, or, Eight necessary queries presented to the Parliament and Armies consideration, in this morning of freedom, after a short, but a sharp night of tyranny and oppression. By one who hates both treason and traitors.
titleStmt.author: One who hates both treason and traitors.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for L. Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
